title: E2 Clotheseline Cookies and the Lone Band-Aid
description: In episode two, Em and Christine discuss the insanely haunted Whaley House in San Diego and the just plain insane serial killer Robert Durst. And that’s why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
